TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ManualResetEventSlim extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 提供 的简化版本。

span.span: Provides a slimmed down version of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可将此类用于更好的性能比时等待时间预计非常短，并且该事件不会跨越进程边界。You can use this class for better performance than when wait times are expected to be very short, and when the event does not cross a process boundary. 等待事件收到信号期间， 会短暂使用忙碌旋转。 uses busy spinning for a short time while it waits for the event to become signaled. 等待时间较短时，旋转的开销相对于使用等待句柄来进行等待的开销会少很多。When wait times are short, spinning can be much less expensive than waiting by using wait handles. 不过，如果在特定时间段内事件没有收到信号， 会求助于常规的事件句柄等待。However, if the event does not become signaled within a certain period of time, resorts to a regular event handle wait. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用。The following example shows how to use a . 有关使用详细信息`SpinCount`和其他最佳做法，有关使用这种类型，请参阅[ManualResetEvent 和 ManualResetEventSlim](~/docs/standard/threading/manualresetevent-and-manualreseteventslim.md)。For more information about the use of `SpinCount` and other best practices concerning the use of this type, see [ManualResetEvent and ManualResetEventSlim](~/docs/standard/threading/manualresetevent-and-manualreseteventslim.md). [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.manualreseteventslim/cs/mres.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ManualResetEventSlim#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.manualreseteventslim/vb/mres.vb#01)]

threadsafe.span: 所有公共和受保护成员都是线程安全的同时从多个线程，Dispose 除外，它必须仅能时使用所有其他操作完成，并将重置，这应仅用于当没有其他线程同时访问该事件。

span.span: All public and protected members of are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads, with the exception of Dispose, which must only be used when all other operations on the have completed, and Reset, which should only be used when no other threads are accessing the event.
ManualResetEvent and ManualResetEventSlim

span.span: Releases resources used by the current instance of the class.
ManualResetEvent and ManualResetEventSlim

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放由 类的当前实例占用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 `Dispose` 后，应调用 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法使 处于不可用状态。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用`Dispose`，必须释放对所有引用这样垃圾回收器才能收回内存的占用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 `Dispose` 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

span.span: ManualResetEvent and ManualResetEventSlim

Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 如果为 true，则同时释放托管资源和非托管资源；如果为 false，则仅释放非托管资源。

span.span: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the , and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与大多数的成员的不同，不是线程安全的不能与此实例的其他成员同时使用。Unlike most of the members of , is not thread-safe and may not be used concurrently with other members of this instance.

summary.span: 将事件状态设置为非终止状态，从而导致线程受阻。

span.span: Sets the state of the event to nonsignaled, which causes threads to block.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以调用与以外的所有成员同时。 can be called concurrently with all members except .

span.span: The object has already been disposed.

summary.span: 将事件状态设置为有信号，从而允许一个或多个等待该事件的线程继续。

span.span: Sets the state of the event to signaled, which allows one or more threads waiting on the event to proceed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Wait() cil managed

summary.span: 阻止当前线程，直到设置了当前 为止。

span.span: Blocks the current thread until the current is set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置了此方法进行阻止，直到当前实例无限期的调用方。The caller of this method blocks indefinitely until the current instance is set. 如果事件当前是在设置状态中，调用方将立即返回。The caller will return immediately if the event is currently in a set state.

span.span: The maximum number of waiters has been exceeded.
The object has already been disposed.
ManualResetEvent and ManualResetEventSlim

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WaitHandle As WaitHandle
public: property System::Threading::WaitHandle ^ WaitHandle { System::Threading::WaitHandle ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取此 的基础 对象。

span.span: Gets the underlying object for this .

value.span: 此 的基础 事件对象。

span.span: The underlying event object fore this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果尚未创建一个将访问此属性强制基础事件对象的初始化。Accessing this property forces initialization of an underlying event object if one hasn't already been created. 只需等待对此，公共等待方法应为首选。To simply wait on this , the public Wait methods should be preferred. 建议要释放后访问此属性，以防止资源泄漏的实例。It is recommended to dispose the instance after accessing this property, in order to prevent a resource leak.

span.span: ManualResetEvent and ManualResetEventSlim
